name: Gate 2 Freedom
overview: Gate 2 Freedom is a fantasy platform game with some adventure elements. The player may walk, jump, take, drop or use item. Pocket fits one item at a time. Contact with spikes or hostile creatures takes some energy. The energy may be supplemented by eating an apple. The main tasks are given by sorcerer hidden inside the magic gate, filling them requires perform numerous mini-quests and proving dexterity skill. The game is Polish but most of the text in game is in English.
